channel.title: Dragon claws spec bug HELP
channel.description:
Ok so on my server, dragon claws work "fully", with the right spec animation and hits but actually only the first 2 hits do actual damage and the other two just appear but don't do much other than spamming. In other words my d claws are basically a DDS.
Is there any way so I can make the four hits of the d claws actually hit? Thanks.

item.title: Dragon claws spec bug HELP
item.dc:creator: @str_pker0 str pker0
item.description:
@str_pker0 wrote:

Ok so on my server, dragon claws work “fully”, with the right spec animation and hits but actually only the first 2 hits do actual damage and the other two just appear but don’t do much other than spamming.
In other words my d claws are basically a DDS.

Is there any way so I can make the four hits of the d claws actually hit?
Thanks.
